verbs.description: The [ARG1: Fair Pay and Safe Workplaces] [V: rule] bars serial labor - law violators from receiving federal money . Trump just overturned it .
The Fair Pay and Safe Workplaces rule bars [ARG0: serial labor - law violators] from [V: receiving] [ARG1: federal money] . Trump just overturned it .
The Fair Pay and Safe Workplaces rule bars serial labor - law violators from receiving federal money . [ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-ADV: just] [V: overturned] [ARG1: it] .
